resources.string: Status: Data is being collected about what you have installed on your device.
Status: Data is being collected about what you have previously used your phone for.
Please press on the READ QR-CODE button to scan a QR-Code associated with the study.
The QR-Code that you previously scanned has configured this app to collect particular types of data. These include:
Please press OK if you are happy that this data is being collected. If not, please contact the research and be prepared to withdraw from the study if you feel it is necessary.
The only remaining step is to send the data to the researcher by email. Do you wish to send the data at this point?
There was a problem reading the QR-Code. Can you please scan the code again

Much effort has gone into securing the data that this app collects. Every effort has been made to give you control of your data. Your data can not and will not be shared without you explicitly emailing/exporting the data. \n\nHowever, it is important that you do not participate in this study if your phone is rooted (jail-broken) or if you believe that the normal Android security on your phone is compromised.
In order to participate, you will have to grant the following permissions:
To configure this app for the study you are participating in, a QR-Code needs to be scanned. Please allow the app to access the phone\'s camera.

The study you are taking part in needs you to grant \"usage\" permissions.\n\nThis allows the app to collect information about what you have used your phone for, currently, and previously, and when the screen has been on or off.
The study you are taking part in needs you to grant permissions for \"notifications\".\n\nThis means the app will collect information about when you receive and when you delete notifications.
Thank you! All essential permissions have been given.
What Usage logger has been requested to do
This app is has been developed for research purposes. If you are not participating in any research study, please uninstall this app.

This app helps researchers to identify what you are using your phone for. Please do not use this app for any other purposes. If you have been asked to use this app for purposes unrelated to scientific research then please uninstall it now. At this point no data has been collected.
- What apps are installed on your phone.
- What permissions that the installed apps on your phone request.
- How you have previously responded to app\'s request for permission requests
- What you have previously used your phone for

days. This will include: when the screen was used and when apps were used. No information will be collected on what you did with the apps. However, inferences may be made regarding what you could have done with these apps
- How you will use your phone in the future. This will include:
- When the screen is off or on
- What apps you use and when you use them
- When an app sends you a notification and when you delete the notification
- When you change the apps installed
